testcase.name: Test Case 15
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then Verify that home page is visible successfully..........................passed Then User clicks 'Signup / Login' button to to start registtartion..........passed Then User fills all details in Signup and create account....................passed Then Verify 'ACCOUNT CREATED!' and click 'Continue' button..................passed Then Verify ' Logged in as username' at top.................................passed Then User adds products to cart.............................................passed Then User click 'Cart' button...............................................passed Then Verify that cart page is displayed.....................................passed Then User clicks Proceed To Checkout........................................passed Then Verify Address Details and Review Your Order...........................passed Then User enters description in comment text area and click 'Place Order'..passed Then User enters payment details: Name on Card, Card Number, CVC, Expiration date.passed Then User clicks 'Pay and Confirm Order' button to complete payment.........passed Then Verify success message 'Your order has been placed successfully!'......passed Then User clicks 'Delete Account' button to delete account..................passed Then User clicks Continue button to go on...................................passed
